choices: CPU/CPU candidates!
Oracles!
Makers!
Villains!
Other! (Side game characters, misc humans, etc)
1.content:
We'll be organizing each character path through their role in the games- CPU/CPU candidates, Oracle, Maker, or Villain.

Choose your path and have fun! o/
1.title: Choose your path!

choices: The childish and playful Neptune/Purple Heart
The haughty tsundere Noire/Black Heart
The beatiful and mature Vert/Green Heart
The quiet but secretly vulgar Blanc/White Heart
More!
11.content:
Good choice, the goddesses and their little sisters will always appreciate your support and adoration to increase their shares!

But who will you be shrunken with?
11.title: CPU/CPU candidates!

choices: The lovable series protagonist, of course!
The older, alternate dimension Neptune for me, please!
111.content: But wait! There's technically two Neps- the series protagonist and goddess we know and love, and the alternate universe version of her that appeared in Megadimension Neptunia IV that never gained goddess powers- reference here: https://hyperdimensionneptunia.fandom.co...(Ultra_Dimension). Which one do you want to be shrunken with?
111.title: Shrunken with Nep!

choices: The cute, sleepy, secretly sadistic Plutia/Iris Heart
The cool but secretly cutesy Uzume/Orange Heart
More!
115.content: Aside from the main four goddesses, there are plenty of other cute ones introduced in the series!
115.title: More CPU's?

choices: The young and energetic Peashy/Yellow Heart
I want to be tiny with the CPU candidates!
1153.content: Only one more option before we get to the little sisters!
1153.title: Last one before we get to the candidates

choices: The plain but good hearted Nepgear
The cutie with an inferiority complex, Uni
More candidates?
11532.content: Alright then! Let's start listing them off then...
11532.title: I want to be tiny with the CPU candidates!

choices: The shy and sweet twin, Rom
The twin with the big attitude, Ram
115323.content: These are the last two candidates!
115323.title: The last two!

choices: The tiny fairy, Histoire?
The hardworking and boyish Kei?
Vert's own fangirl, Chika?
The studious and kind Mina?
12.content:
These four are the cuties that keep their nations running! Hopefully they'll have time to have fun with their tiny visitor between all that work...

But who do you want to be tiny with?
12.title: Oracles!

choices: The sweet but ditzy nurse-in-training, Compa
The tomboyish and confident gal with a chuunibyou complex, IF
The cutie always searching to add to her harem, Red?
The hero of justice with a chest size complex, Nisa?
More!
13.content:
There are quite a lot of these side kick cuties, but they're all unique in their own way!

It's gonna be quite a bit of time listing all of these, so lets get started!
13.title: Makers!

choices: The pop idol, 5pb.?
The wizard with mysterious research, MAGES?
Even more Makers?
135.title: More Makers!

choices: The responsible, almost cold maid-assassin, Cave?
The honourable mercenary, Falcom?
More!
1353.title: Even more Makers?

choices: The cheerful, independent and strong Ninja, MarvelousAQL?
The powerful but shy and masochistic fighter, Tekken?
More!
13533.title: Still more Makers

choices: The foreign but upbeat cat girl, Cyberconnect2?
The young looking but coldblooded entrepeneur, Gust?
More!
135333.title: Aaaand some more...

choices: The odd, small girl whose mannerisms betray her smarts, Broccoli?
More!
1353333.content: But this is the last one I know of! I'll leave a 'more' chapter open in case I happened to forget any, though.
1353333.title: There's a lot of Makers..

choices: The recurring evil goddess, Arfoire?
Arfoire's personal fangirl, CFW Magic?
The easily forgotten thug, Linda/Underling?
The protector of young girls, Abnes?
More!
14.content:
While a lot of the villains in the world of Gamindustri are guys, there's a number of wicked ladies in the series too! Be careful, most of these gals won't think twice about turning you into a stain if it helps them accomplish their plans, or maybe just if they feel like it..

But which one do you want to risk being tiny with?
14.title: Villains!

choices: The evil Oracle, Croire?
The normally meek and kindhearted but secretly wicked Rei Ryghts?
The original Planeptune CPU that couldn't control her evil, Kurome?
145.content: There are a few more villains in the series to choose from yet!
145.title: More evil ladies?

choices: S-Sha, the intimidating but shy swordfighter?
K-Sha, the yandere's yandere?
C-Sha, the laid back fist fighter?
B-Sha, the tinkerer with a monster phobia?
More!
15.content: Here are the characters that don't fit in any other category! They mostly subsist of side game characters that don't follow normal Neptunia canon, miscellaneous humans like Gold Third, etc. We'll start with the members of Gold Third!
15.title: Starting with the Gold Third..

choices: Bouquet, the guiding fairy with a crush on Vert?
†Black Cat Princess†, the seeming cutesy but secretly manipulative beta tester?
More!
155.content: How about the girls introduced in 4GO?
155.title: 4 Goddesses Online characters!

choices: Chrome, the mysterious woman who knows all about the goddesses?
Artisan, the leader of the resistance?
More SNRPG characters?
1553.content: Now we're getting into characters from Super Neptunia RPG!
1553.title: Super Neptunia RPG characters?

choices: Filyn, the 2D loving antagonist?
Artura, the sadistic mad king?
Last two SNRPG characters...
15533.title: More SNRPG characters?

choices: Ester, the quirky girl with a giant mech?
Paix, the cunning, quiet member of Bombyx Mori?
More characters...
155333.content: Two more! After this, we'd get into DLC characters, Hyperdevotion Noire characters, maybe the Sega Hard Girls, etc..
155333.title: Last two SNRPG characters...

info.brief_description: You're a civilian of Gamindustri and shrink! What will the girls of HDN get into with you?
info.description:
Here's a wiki page that includes all of the characters for anyone not 100% familiar with the series: https://neptunia.fandom.com/wiki/Category:Characters

Rules:
- No low effort additions outside of simple choice chapters. Use proper grammar, spelling, and contribute more than one line additions. No one likes one line additions :)
- To extend on the previous rule, I reserve the right to decide what kind of chapter is 'low effort'. I will try not to remove too much, but if you write sloppy, short chapters riddled with errors I will extend my right to remove your chapter.
- Please keep writing from the perspective of second person. IE, "YOU looked up at the towering girl", "YOU ran to the side to avoid her step", etc.
- Keep the main character nameless and keep their gender ambiguous- no clearly stating their pronouns. I want this story to be enjoyable to everyone that wants to be tiny around HDN characters, not just the boys!
- The tiny this story follows should only be interacting with the girls- nothing against giant boys, just not what this story is for! There aren't many guys in the HDN games anyway so this shouldn't be a problem.
- All fetishes are allowed, go wild~
- The girls can be whatever kind of giant you want, gentle, cruel, playful, whatever. Just try to give them justification that fits their character!
- Try to keep the story going and don't write it into a dead end or kill the main character without giving an option to continue another storyline. IE, if you're going to write a chapter where the main character gets stepped on by Vert and you want the main character to die, include one option where the main character dies and at least one option where the main character lives.
- Similarly, the story ends when/if the main character dies.
- You can be tiny in the presence of more than one girl at a time- if you want a chapter where Vert decides to share you with Chika, that can definitely happen~
- The main character starts at two inches tall. Size changing can happen, but please keep them no smaller than 1/4 inch and no taller than 12 inches (one foot.) None of the girls can grow but if you want some of them can shrink, IE maybe Noire can shrink Neptune so she can play with you and her together.

I know there are a LOT of characters in the Neptunia series but I will try to give options for all of them! Let me know if I missed any and I will try to add chapters for them, thank you

The most important thing is, have fun! I will try to give out GP to good additions :3
